Title: Diabolique
Writer: Pierre Boileau (novel), Thomas Narcejac (novel), Henri-Georges Clouzot (scenario and dialogue), Jérôme Géronimi (scenario and dialogue), René Masson (collaboration), Frédéric Grendel (collaboration)
Actors: Simone Signoret, Véra Clouzot, Paul Meurisse, Charles Vanel
Plot: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.
